isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Power Source (Sleeper) W/48, 60 Inch Flat Roof Sleeper

svcproc.title: Power Source (Sleeper) W/48, 60 Inch Flat Roof Sleeper
svcproc.para: If an accessory is plugged into the Right Power Source socket, power will flow from battery stud B2 through circuit 14AP, fuse F8 - D, circuit 14AX, 14P, fuse K3, and circuit 84B to Right Power Source socket. The ground path is circuit 11H, and 11D to sleeper ground.

If an accessory is plugged into the Console Power Source socket, power will flow from battery stud B2 through circuit 14AP, fuse F8 - D, circuit 14AX, 14P, fuse K4, and circuit 84A to Console Power Source socket. The ground path is circuit 11B to sleeper ground.
